# OsConfig

Configuration for the host OS.

| Characteristic | Value |
| -------------- | ----- |
| Type | `object` |

## Properties

### `users` (optional)

Map of users to configure on the host. The key is the username.

| Characteristic | Value |
| -------------- | ----- |
| Type | `array` |
| Default | `[]` |

- Items of the array must have the type:

   | Characteristic | Value |
   | -------------- | ----- |
   | Type | `User` |
   | Link | [User](./User.md) |
